evidence: adapt SSIM for color image quality assessment
SSIM is applied not just frame by frame, but also across time
evaluates images at different levels of resolution
can handle images that have complex values
normalize by the mean and by the variation

triples.evidence: Color Image Quality Assessment Toet & Lucassen, Displays, '03
Video Quality Assessment Wang, et al., Signal Processing: Image Communication, '04
Multi-scale SSIM Wang, et al., Invited Paper, IEEE Asilomar Conf. '03
Complex Wavelet SSIM Wang & Simoncelli, ICASSP '05

evidence: This involves measuring similarity not only in brightness and contrast, but also in the relationships between color channels.
Here, SSIM is applied not just frame by frame, but also across time, because our eyes are sensitive to temporal consistency.
This is especially useful because human vision itself operates on a multi-scale level - we notice both fine details and large structures, depending on how we view an image.
This is a powerful extension that broadens SSIM to applications in medical imaging and beyond.

concepts.term: measure differences relative to expectations and variability, not in absolute terms

evidence: Here, SSIM is applied not just frame by frame, but also across time, because our eyes are sensitive to temporal consistency.
